user_stories.title: Blast radius block triggers re-implementation
user_stories.story: As the SDLC framework, when blast-radius-validator blocks because files are unaddressed, I want to return to the implementation phase and implement changes for the missing files, so that the blast radius is fully covered without relaxing validation criteria.

user_stories.title: Task plan cross-reference on blast radius block
user_stories.story: As the phase-loop controller, when processing a blast radius block, I want to cross-reference unaddressed files against docs/isdlc/tasks.md, so that I can identify which specific tasks were skipped and include them in the re-delegation prompt.

user_stories.title: Blast radius retry loop with limit
user_stories.story: As the phase-loop controller, after re-delegating to implementation for unaddressed blast radius files, I want to retry the gate validation to verify coverage, with a maximum of 3 retries before escalating, so that infinite loops are prevented.

user_stories.title: Explicit deferral via requirements spec only
user_stories.story: As the blast radius validator, I want to accept file deferrals only when they are documented in the requirements spec's Deferred Files section, so that auto-generated deferrals by the orchestrator cannot bypass blast radius validation.

user_stories.title: STEP 3f blast-radius-specific block handling
user_stories.story: As the isdlc.md phase-loop controller, when STEP 3f encounters a blast-radius-validator block, I want to extract the unaddressed file list, match it to tasks.md, and re-delegate to implementation, so that the blast radius is addressed through implementation rather than deferral.
